text: Rinjala Raherinaivo (born 25 May 1998) is a Malagasy international footballer who plays as a midfielder for CNaPS Sport and the Madagascar national football team. ==International career== Raherinaivo made his debut for the Madagascar senior team in a 6–1 defeat by DR Congo in a qualification game for the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="2"|FC Sion II |2016–17 |1.
